019package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getNMTokenValidator;
025
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.net.URISyntaxException;
028import java.time.Instant;
029import java.time.LocalDate;
030import java.time.LocalDateTime;
031import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
032import java.util.Optional;
033
034import org.apiguardian.api.API;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal.XMLDocumentImpl;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Document;
038
039/**
040 *  The definition for an XML document.
041 *
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: XMLDocument.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.0.5
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 */
048@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyMethods", "InterfaceMayBeAnnotatedFunctional"} )
049@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLDocument.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
050@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
051public sealed interface XMLDocument extends Document<XMLElement>
052    permits XMLDocumentImpl
053{
054        /*---------*\
055    ====** Methods **==========================================================
056        \*---------*/
057    /**
058     *  Adds a child to the root element of this document.
059     *
060     *  @param  child    The child to add.
061     *  @return This instance.
062     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The child is not allowed for the
063     *      root element of this document, or the root element does not allow
064     *      adding children at all.
065     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
066     *      not the root XML element.
067     */
068    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
069    public default XMLDocument addChild( final XMLElement child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
070    {
071        getRootElement().addChild( child );
072
073        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
074        return this;
075    }   //  addChild()
076
077    /**
078     *  Adds a comment to the root element of this document.
079     *
080     *  @param  comment The comment to add.
081     *  @return This instance.
082     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The root element does not allow
083     *      adding comments.
084     */
085    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
086    public default XMLDocument addComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalArgumentException
087    {
088        getRootElement().addComment( comment );
089
090        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
091        return this;
092    }   //  //  addComment()
093
094    /**
095     *  Adds a comment to the document itself.
096     *
097     *  @param  comment The comment to add.
098     *  @return This instance.
099     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The document does not allow adding
100     *      comments.
101     */
102    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
103    public default XMLDocument addDocumentComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalArgumentException
104    {
105        throw new IllegalArgumentException( "No comment allowed for this document" );
106    }   //  addDocumentComment()
107
108    /**
109     *  Adds predefined XML markup to the root element of this document. The
110     *  given markup will not be validated, it just may not be {@code null}. So
111     *  the caller is responsible that it will be proper XML.<br>
112     *  <br>As the markup may be formatted differently (or not formatted at
113     *  all), the pretty printed output may be distorted when this is used.
114     *
115     *  @param  markup  The XML markup.
116     *  @return This instance.
117     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The root element does not allow
118     *      adding children at all.
119     */
120    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
121    public default XMLDocument addPredefinedMarkup( final CharSequence markup ) throws IllegalArgumentException
122    {
123        getRootElement().addPredefinedMarkup( markup );
124
125        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
126        return this;
127    }   //  addPredefinedMarkup()
128
129    /**
130     *  Adds a processing instruction to this document.
131     *
132     *  @param  processingInstruction   The procession instruction to add.
133     *  @return This instance.
134     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    This document does not allow adding
135     *      processing instructions.
136     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The processing instruction has already
137     *      a parent.
138     */
139    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
140    public default XMLDocument addProcessingInstruction( final ProcessingInstruction processingInstruction ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
141    {
142        throw new IllegalArgumentException( "No processing instructions allowed for this document" );
143    }   //  addProcessingInstruction()
144
145    /**
146     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
147     *  document.<br>
148     *  <br>The method uses
149     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
150     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.
151     *
152     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
153     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value.
154     *  @return This instance.
155     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
156     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
157     *      all.
158     */
159    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException
160    {
161        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, flag );
162
163        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
164        return this;
165    }   //  setAttribute()
166
167    /**
168     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
169     *  document.<br>
170     *  <br>The method uses
171     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
172     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.
173     *
174     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
175     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
176     *      attribute will be removed.
177     *  @return This instance.
178     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
179     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
180     *      all.
181     */
182    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException
183    {
184        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, flag );
185
186        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
187        return this;
188    }   //  setAttribute()
189
190    /**
191     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
192     *  document.
193     *
194     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
195     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
196     *      attribute will be removed.
197     *  @return This instance.
198     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
199     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
200     *      all.
201     */
202    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
203    {
204        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, value );
205
206        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
207        return this;
208    }   //  setAttribute()
209
210    /**
211     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
212     *  document.
213     *
214     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
215     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
216     *      attribute will be removed.
217     *  @param  append  If not
218     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}, the new value will be appended
219     *      on an already existing one, and this sequence is used as the
220     *      separator.
221     *  @return This instance.
222     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
223     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
224     *      all.
225     */
226    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
227    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> append ) throws IllegalArgumentException
228    {
229        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, value, append );
230
231        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
232        return this;
233    }   //  setAttribute()
234
235    /**
236     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
237     *  document.<br>
238     *  <br>The method uses
239     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
240     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
241     *
242     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
243     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
244     *  @return This instance.
245     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
246     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
247     *      all.
248     */
249    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final double number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
250    {
251        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
252
253        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
254        return this;
255    }   //  setAttribute()
256
257    /**
258     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
259     *  document.<br>
260     *  <br>The method uses
261     *  {@link Enum#name()}
262     *  to convert the provided value to a {@code String}.
263     *
264     *  @param  <E> The concrete enum type of {@code value}.
265     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
266     *  @param  enumValue   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
267     *      attribute will be removed.
268     *  @return This instance.
269     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
270     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
271     *      all.
272     */
273    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final E enumValue ) throws IllegalArgumentException
274    {
275        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, enumValue );
276
277        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
278        return this;
279    }   //  setAttribute()
280
281    /**
282     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
283     *  document.<br>
284     *  <br>The method uses
285     *  {@link Instant#toString()}
286     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
287     *
288     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
289     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
290     *      attribute will be removed.
291     *  @return This instance.
292     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
293     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
294     *      all.
295     */
296    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final Instant date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
297    {
298        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
299
300        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
301        return this;
302    }   //  setAttribute()
303
304    /**
305     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
306     *  document.<br>
307     *  <br>The method uses
308     *  {@link Integer#toString(int)}
309     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
310     *
311     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
312     *  @param  number  The attribute's value.
313     *  @return This instance.
314     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
315     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
316     *      all.
317     */
318    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final int number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
319    {
320        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
321
322        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
323        return this;
324    }   //  setAttribute()
325
326    /**
327     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
328     *  document.<br>
329     *  <br>The method uses
330     *  {@link LocalDate#toString()}
331     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
332     *
333     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
334     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
335     *      attribute will be removed.
336     *  @return This instance.
337     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
338     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
339     *      all.
340     */
341    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final LocalDate date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
342    {
343        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
344
345        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
346        return this;
347    }   //  setAttribute()
348
349    /**
350     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
351     *  document.<br>
352     *  <br>The method uses
353     *  {@link LocalDateTime#toString()}
354     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
355     *
356     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
357     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
358     *      attribute will be removed.
359     *  @return This instance.
360     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
361     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
362     *      all.
363     */
364    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final LocalDateTime date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
365    {
366        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
367
368        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
369        return this;
370    }   //  setAttribute()
371
372    /**
373     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
374     *  document.<br>
375     *  <br>The method uses
376     *  {@link Long#toString(long)}
377     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
378     *
379     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
380     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
381     *  @return This instance.
382     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
383     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
384     *      all.
385     */
386    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final long number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
387    {
388        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
389
390        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
391        return this;
392    }   //  setAttribute()
393
394    /**
395     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
396     *  document.<br>
397     *  <br>The method uses
398     *  {@link Number#toString()}
399     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
400     *
401     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
402     *  @param  number   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
403     *      attribute will be removed.
404     *  @return This instance.
405     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
406     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
407     *      all.
408     */
409    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final Number number ) throws IllegalArgumentException
410    {
411        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, number );
412
413        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
414        return this;
415    }   //  setAttribute()
416
417    /**
418     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
419     *  document.<br>
420     *  <br>The method uses
421     *  {@link ZonedDateTime#toString()}
422     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.
423     *
424     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
425     *  @param  date    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
426     *      attribute will be removed.
427     *  @return This instance.
428     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
429     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
430     *      all.
431     */
432    public default XMLDocument setAttribute( final String name, final ZonedDateTime date ) throws IllegalArgumentException
433    {
434        getRootElement().setAttribute( name, date );
435
436        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
437        return this;
438    }   //  setAttribute()
439
440    /**
441     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
442     *  document if the provided value is not empty.<br>
443     *  <br>The method uses
444     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils#isNotEmpty(CharSequence)}
445     *  to test if the given value is empty.
446     *
447     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
448     *  @param  value   The value for the attribute; can be {@code null}.
449     *  @return This instance.
450     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
451     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
452     *      all.
453     */
454    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
455    public default XMLDocument setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException
456    {
457        getRootElement().setAttributeIfNotEmpty( name, value );
458
459        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
460        return this;
461    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
462
463    /**
464     *  Sets the attribute with the given name to the root element of this
465     *  document if the provided value is not empty.
466     *
467     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
468     *  @param  optional   The value for the attribute.
469     *  @return This instance.
470     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
471     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
472     *      all.
473     */
474    @SuppressWarnings( {"UnusedReturnValue", "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType"} )
475    public default XMLDocument setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> optional ) throws IllegalArgumentException
476    {
477        getRootElement().setAttributeIfNotEmpty( name, optional );
478
479        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
480        return this;
481    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
482
483    /**
484     *  Sets the id for the root element of this document.<br>
485     *  <br>The value will be validated using the method that is provided by a
486     *  call to
487     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getNMTokenValidator()}.
488     *
489     *  @param  id  The id.
490     *  @return This instance.
491     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The attribute is not allowed for
492     *      the root element, or the root element does not allow attributes at
493     *      all.
494     *
495     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#XMLATTRIBUTE_Id
496     */
497    public default XMLDocument setId( final String id ) throws IllegalArgumentException
498    {
499        if( !getNMTokenValidator().test( requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "id" ) ) ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( "Invalid id: %s", id ) );
500        getRootElement().setId( id );
501
502        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
503        return this;
504    }   //  setId()
505
506    /**
507     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.
508     *
509     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
510     *  @return This instance.
511     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
512     *      element.
513     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
514     */
515    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final String identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
516    {
517        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( identifier ) );
518
519        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
520        return this;
521    }   //  setNamespace()
522
523    /**
524     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.
525     *
526     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
527     *  @return This instance.
528     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
529     *      element.
530     */
531    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final URI identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException
532    {
533        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( identifier ) );
534
535        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
536        return this;
537    }   //  setNamespace()
538
539    /**
540     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.<br>
541     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
542     *  provided by
543     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
544     *
545     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
546     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
547     *  @return This instance.
548     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
549     *      element.
550     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
551     */
552    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
553    {
554        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( prefix, identifier ) );
555
556        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
557        return this;
558    }   //  setNamespace()
559
560    /**
561     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.<br>
562     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
563     *  provided by
564     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
565     *
566     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
567     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
568     *  @return This instance.
569     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
570     *      element.
571     */
572    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier ) throws IllegalArgumentException
573    {
574        getRootElement().setNamespace( new Namespace( prefix, identifier ) );
575
576        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
577        return this;
578    }   //  setNamespace()
579
580    /**
581     *  Sets the given namespace to the root element of this document.
582     *
583     *  @param  namespace   The namespace.
584     *  @return This instance.
585     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
586     *      element.
587     */
588    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
589    public default XMLDocument setNamespace( final Namespace namespace ) throws IllegalArgumentException
590    {
591        getRootElement().setNamespace( namespace );
592
593        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
594        return this;
595    }   //  setNamespace()
596}
597//  interface XMLDocument
598
599/*
600 *  End of File
601 */
